page.title: 05FAMILY LIFE IN 1985.
page.content: {FAMILY LIFE -}Most families live near our two schools. Some are one-parent families. Most adults work locally, but some are unemployed. Some mothers go out to work, but others remain at home and do the housework. In the mornings we have breakfast between 7.00 and 8.30. On weekdays we are at school from 9.00 a.m. until 3.15 or 3.30p.m. We have lunch there and tea at home. Evenings and Weekends: We play at home or on the recreation ground. Our families watch Television or go for walks. Sometimes our parents go to the pub. Occasionally relatives come to stay or we go to visit them. Many families have pets. We wear school clothes on weekdays and play clothes at home. We dress up in our best clothes to go out. Many mothers can knit and sew, and they make some of our clothes.
